## Overview

<p>Utilities for encoding and decoding common formats like hex, base64, and varint.</p>
<h2 id="basic-usage">
Basic Usage</h2>
<pre class="highlight"><code><span class="pl-k">import</span> { encodeBase64, decodeBase64 } <span class="pl-k">from</span> <span class="pl-s">"@std/encoding"</span>;
<span class="pl-k">import</span> { assertEquals } <span class="pl-k">from</span> <span class="pl-s">"@std/assert"</span>;

<span class="pl-k">const</span> foobar <span class="pl-c1">=</span> <span class="pl-k">new</span> <span class="pl-smi">TextEncoder</span>().<span class="pl-en">encode</span>(<span class="pl-s">"foobar"</span>);
<span class="pl-en">assertEquals</span>(<span class="pl-en">encodeBase64</span>(foobar), <span class="pl-s">"Zm9vYmFy"</span>);
<span class="pl-en">assertEquals</span>(<span class="pl-en">decodeBase64</span>(<span class="pl-s">"Zm9vYmFy"</span>), foobar);
</code></pre>
<h2 id="various-encoding-formats">
Various Encoding Formats</h2>
<pre class="highlight"><code><span class="pl-k">import</span> {
  encodeHex,
  encodeBase32,
  encodeBase58,
  encodeBase64,
  encodeAscii85,
  decodeHex,
  decodeBase32,
  decodeBase58,
  decodeBase64,
  decodeAscii85,
} <span class="pl-k">from</span> <span class="pl-s">"@std/encoding"</span>;
<span class="pl-k">import</span> { assertEquals } <span class="pl-k">from</span> <span class="pl-s">"@std/assert"</span>;

<span class="pl-c">// Many different encodings for different character sets</span>
<span class="pl-en">assertEquals</span>(<span class="pl-en">encodeHex</span>(<span class="pl-s">"Hello world!"</span>), <span class="pl-s">"48656c6c6f20776f726c6421"</span>);
<span class="pl-en">assertEquals</span>(<span class="pl-en">encodeBase32</span>(<span class="pl-s">"Hello world!"</span>), <span class="pl-s">"JBSWY3DPEB3W64TMMQQQ===="</span>);
<span class="pl-en">assertEquals</span>(<span class="pl-en">encodeBase58</span>(<span class="pl-s">"Hello world!"</span>), <span class="pl-s">"2NEpo7TZRhna7vSvL"</span>);
<span class="pl-en">assertEquals</span>(<span class="pl-en">encodeBase64</span>(<span class="pl-s">"Hello world!"</span>), <span class="pl-s">"SGVsbG8gd29ybGQh"</span>);
<span class="pl-en">assertEquals</span>(<span class="pl-en">encodeAscii85</span>(<span class="pl-s">"Hello world!"</span>), <span class="pl-s">"87cURD]j7BEbo80"</span>);

<span class="pl-c">// Decoding</span>
<span class="pl-en">assertEquals</span>(<span class="pl-k">new</span> <span class="pl-smi">TextDecoder</span>().<span class="pl-en">decode</span>(<span class="pl-en">decodeHex</span>(<span class="pl-s">"48656c6c6f20776f726c6421"</span>)), <span class="pl-s">"Hello world!"</span>);
<span class="pl-en">assertEquals</span>(<span class="pl-k">new</span> <span class="pl-smi">TextDecoder</span>().<span class="pl-en">decode</span>(<span class="pl-en">decodeBase32</span>(<span class="pl-s">"JBSWY3DPEB3W64TMMQQQ===="</span>)), <span class="pl-s">"Hello world!"</span>);
<span class="pl-en">assertEquals</span>(<span class="pl-k">new</span> <span class="pl-smi">TextDecoder</span>().<span class="pl-en">decode</span>(<span class="pl-en">decodeBase58</span>(<span class="pl-s">"2NEpo7TZRhna7vSvL"</span>)), <span class="pl-s">"Hello world!"</span>);
<span class="pl-en">assertEquals</span>(<span class="pl-k">new</span> <span class="pl-smi">TextDecoder</span>().<span class="pl-en">decode</span>(<span class="pl-en">decodeBase64</span>(<span class="pl-s">"SGVsbG8gd29ybGQh"</span>)), <span class="pl-s">"Hello world!"</span>);
<span class="pl-en">assertEquals</span>(<span class="pl-k">new</span> <span class="pl-smi">TextDecoder</span>().<span class="pl-en">decode</span>(<span class="pl-en">decodeAscii85</span>(<span class="pl-s">"87cURD]j7BEbo80"</span>)), <span class="pl-s">"Hello world!"</span>);
</code></pre>
<h2 id="url-safe-base64">
URL-Safe Base64</h2>
<pre class="highlight"><code><span class="pl-k">import</span> { encodeBase64, encodeBase64Url } <span class="pl-k">from</span> <span class="pl-s">"@std/encoding"</span>;
<span class="pl-k">import</span> { assertEquals } <span class="pl-k">from</span> <span class="pl-s">"@std/assert"</span>;

<span class="pl-en">assertEquals</span>(<span class="pl-en">encodeBase64</span>(<span class="pl-s">"ice creams"</span>), <span class="pl-s">"aWNlIGNyZWFtcw=="</span>); <span class="pl-c">// Not url-safe because of `=`</span>
<span class="pl-en">assertEquals</span>(<span class="pl-en">encodeBase64Url</span>(<span class="pl-s">"ice creams"</span>), <span class="pl-s">"aWNlIGNyZWFtcw"</span>); <span class="pl-c">// URL-safe!</span>

<span class="pl-c">// Base64Url replaces + with - and / with _</span>
<span class="pl-en">assertEquals</span>(<span class="pl-en">encodeBase64</span>(<span class="pl-s">"subjects?"</span>), <span class="pl-s">"c3ViamVjdHM/"</span>); <span class="pl-c">// slash is not URL-safe</span>
<span class="pl-en">assertEquals</span>(<span class="pl-en">encodeBase64Url</span>(<span class="pl-s">"subjects?"</span>), <span class="pl-s">"c3ViamVjdHM_"</span>); <span class="pl-c">// _ is URL-safe</span>
</code></pre>
<h2 id="binary-data-encoding">
Binary Data Encoding</h2>
<pre class="highlight"><code><span class="pl-k">import</span> { encodeHex, encodeBase64 } <span class="pl-k">from</span> <span class="pl-s">"@std/encoding"</span>;
<span class="pl-k">import</span> { assertEquals } <span class="pl-k">from</span> <span class="pl-s">"@std/assert"</span>;

<span class="pl-c">// Working with binary data</span>
<span class="pl-k">const</span> binaryData <span class="pl-c1">=</span> <span class="pl-k">new</span> <span class="pl-smi">Uint8Array</span>([<span class="pl-c1">0xDE</span>, <span class="pl-c1">0xAD</span>, <span class="pl-c1">0xBE</span>, <span class="pl-c1">0xEF</span>]);
<span class="pl-en">assertEquals</span>(<span class="pl-en">encodeHex</span>(binaryData), <span class="pl-s">"deadbeef"</span>);
<span class="pl-en">assertEquals</span>(<span class="pl-en">encodeBase64</span>(binaryData), <span class="pl-s">"3q2+7w=="</span>);
</code></pre>
<h2 id="varint-encoding">
Varint Encoding</h2>
<p>Learn more from the <a href="https://protobuf.dev/programming-guides/encoding/#varints" rel="nofollow">protobuf Varint encoding docs</a>.</p>
<pre class="highlight"><code><span class="pl-k">import</span> { encodeVarint, decodeVarint } <span class="pl-k">from</span> <span class="pl-s">"@std/encoding"</span>;
<span class="pl-k">import</span> { assertEquals } <span class="pl-k">from</span> <span class="pl-s">"@std/assert"</span>;

<span class="pl-c">// Varint encoding support</span>
<span class="pl-en">assertEquals</span>(<span class="pl-en">encodeVarint</span>(<span class="pl-c1">9601n</span>), [<span class="pl-k">new</span> <span class="pl-smi">Uint8Array</span>([<span class="pl-c1">129</span>, <span class="pl-c1">75</span>]), <span class="pl-c1">2</span>]);

<span class="pl-c">// Decode a varint</span>
<span class="pl-k">const</span> bytes <span class="pl-c1">=</span> <span class="pl-k">new</span> <span class="pl-smi">Uint8Array</span>([<span class="pl-c1">129</span>, <span class="pl-c1">75</span>]);
<span class="pl-en">assertEquals</span>(<span class="pl-en">decodeVarint</span>(bytes), [<span class="pl-c1">9601n</span>, <span class="pl-c1">2</span>]);
</code></pre>
